title: Entreatos (2004)
description:
The movie was filmed during the presidential elections in 2002, both first and second turn. The movie was filmed in miniDV. The president appears in a way that he had never shows up before. He smokes his cigarillos and always has a beer in hand when he is not working.

He says he doesn&#039;t like military forces, he tell bad things about his opponents and speaks a lot of bad words. Seeing this movie you realize that he is really an unique president, like no other in the history of Brazil, or many others countries. His friends and politic Allies are also showed in the picture with very much reality. 

Of course everybody saw the camera, but even though, they acted different than they would act on television cameras. In the campaign it is clear the importance of the marketeer. A person that can change the result of the elections, and change the future of the country. It takes to another discussion: should the people vote for the best politician or the best marketeer ?? Anyway, it is a raw look at the high politic campaign. And for bonus, it is very funny, because the president Lula is very funny.
